title: Buying bonds from individuals increases MS

content.question: Assume a countryâ€™s banking system has limited reserves. If the central bank buys government bonds from individuals on the open market and banks do not loan out any excess reserves created by the open market purchase, which of the following will happen?

choices.label: The money supply will remain unchanged.
Loans to the private sector will increase.
The level of actual reserves will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
